briefdescription.para: Each class should have its own logger - here temporary for all weapons.
Instance counter.
Texture Binds shared between instances.
Base position (hook i).
Base orientation (hook i).
Position relative to base position and orientation (hook i).
Orientation relative to base position and orientation (hook i).
Mountpoint-index of the weapon.
Target object id for weapons that need targeting.
Set to true to enable triggering (default true).
Triggering firing of weapon (once).
Enable drawing of the weapon itself.
Relative size and power of the weapon, 1.0 default mechscale weapon.
True when firing was just really triggered last animation cycle.
True when firing was just really triggered second last animation cycle.
Current Matrix indicating world pos & orientation (pose) of this weapon.
Remaining reload time until next firing is possible.
Remaining readying time for bringing up the weapon (unused).
Remaining firing time when firing takes more than an instant time.
Remaining shots until reloading another clip (negative == infinitive?).
Remaining clips (negative == infinitive?).
Maximum amount of Ammo inside a clip.
Maximum amount of clips.
OpenAL sound source for this weapon's sounds.
Particle container with variable meaning.
Particle container with variable meaning.
Particle container with variable meaning.
Particle container for particles with induce damage.
Get id - address for now.
Load sound source from WAV-file.
Start playback of audio source.
Start playback of audio source if it isn't playing anymore.
"Eignungsbeurteilung"

detaileddescription.para: Fuzzy-Value [0,1] indicating usability or fittness of this weapon to be fired right now (not considering weapon state). May sum up (depends on Weapon) (future): +Ability/Possibility to hit target (may roll some dice). +Possible damage on target. +Possible damage on other enemy units (owner's enemies). -Possible self-damage. -Possible ally-damage. +In (optimal) Firerange. -Out of (optimal) Firerange.

briefdescription.para: Considering weapon state, true when weapon is at hand, ready-loaded and unlocked.
Update weapon animation cycles, trigger, particle trajectories and timers.
Calculate transformations for painting called between animate and draw*.

detaileddescription.para: Calculates current pose according to owners Base and Mount and sets position of sound-source.

briefdescription.para: Draw the weapon model itself and non-translucent particles.
Draw translucent effects like weapon flares and particles.
Paints an iconic display of the weapon type and state into ortho [0..1,0..1] view.

memberdef.argsstring: (float *worldpos, float radius, int roles, float damage)
memberdef.name: damageByParticle

briefdescription.para: Returns amount of damaged objects (currently just one at most).
Helper function for transform, call to transform to world coord system.
Base-Class of all weapons.

detaileddescription.para: Defines "all you need" for designing different kinds of weapons and their visual effects. Note that weapons are themselves responsible for drawing themselves, their bullets, missiles, dust, smoke and other particles.
